llm.feedback: The draft fails the two core criteria: (1) the second Up line lacks a magnitude range and is essentially a duplicate of the first, and (2) the Down lines do not provide explicit sign‑magnitude ranges for the yield compression. Replace the second Up with a distinct asset: “Up | Q4 2025 | Fed cut supports spx rally 2–5 % (56DSYR7J6) | Fed cut announcement, Marvell earnings, tariff updates (B1KYJ1GPU) | 65 %”. Add a magnitude to the Fed‑rate‑hike Down: “Down | Q4 2025 | Fed rate hike compresses 10‑year yield by 20–30 bp (OGK8WLL69) | Fed policy statements, rate hike announcements (OGK8WLL69) | 30 %”. Keep the regulatory‑crackdown Down unchanged but add a plausible magnitude: “Down | Q4 2025 | Regulatory crackdown compresses 10‑year yield by 10–20 bp (OGK8WLL69) | Regulatory announcements, crypto market volatility (OGK8WLL69) | 20 %”. Ensure each line is a single sentence, uses only the required IDs, and follows the strict “Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %” format.
